audioJson.name: Compact disc
audioJson.fact1: Tracks on this format begin on the inside of the disc and spiral outward
audioJson.fact2: Mini CDs ranged between 2.4-3.1" in diameter and stored up to 24 minutes of audio
audioJson.fact3: This format was later adapted to store data on the following formats: CD-ROM, CD-R, CD-RW, Video CD, Super Video CD, Photo CD, Picture CD, CD-Interactive and Enhanced Music CD
